name: Pascual
description:
Don Pascual is an old man who has spent the last yers of his life hunting mexican ghosts and monsters! That's why he is called the Haunting Hunter!

Help him hunt (in order):

1) The Coco
2) The Llorona and
3) The Wicked Axolotl

GAME CONTROLS

[Arrow keys] Move Don Pascual
[Reset button] Resets game
